name: Шість золотих капсул на чорному тлі
description: A sleek and modern 3D abstract design featuring six glossy, capsule-shaped forms arranged side by side. Each element reflects deep metallic orange and golden tones, illuminated with cinematic lighting against a pure black background. The smooth gradients and reflections create a luxurious, futuristic atmosphere reminiscent of molten metal or high-end digital art. Perfect for backgrounds, wallpapers, or design inspiration related to modern aesthetics, technology, and visual minimalism.
